text: A Takfiri is a Muslim who says that another Muslim has apostated (left the religion). 'Takfiri' comes from the word kafir, meaning somebody who does not follow Islam. The ideology partially comes from hadithic (from narrations from Muhammad's life) requirements to enjoin [instruct someone to follow] the good and forbid the evil.2010 Amil Khan, The Long Struggle, p 88 ==Related pages== *Jihad ==References== Category:Islam
title: Takfiri
